directions: Trim fish, then season on both sides. Heat oil in a pan (which can be transferred to the oven.) Fry steaks on one side until crisp underneath. Using a pastry brush, paint Maille(R) Dijon Originale mustard over the top side of the cod.
Place in a pre-heated oven at 400 degrees F for around 5 minutes, depending on thickness.
Sprinkle with chopped parsley and serve.
ingredients: 4 thick cod steaks (or other firm white fish)
title: Fish with Maille® Dijon Originale Mustard
